title: 'Horrifying, abnormal' & maybe 'criminal': NY Fed insider on Giuliani probe and Trump plot
text: The SDNY is criminally investigating Rudy Giuliani for his involvement in the Ukraine plot. Prosecutors are chasing a series of evidence that links Giuliani to Ukraine, including financial evidence that reveals he was paid $500k to consult for a Ukraine company founded by one his associates indicted for federal campaign violations. Former Federal Prosecutor Miriam Baer analyzes the case, calling his behavior ‘abnormal’ and potentially ‘criminal,’ with the evidence being ‘horrifying,’ and she is joined by former Labor Secretary Robert Reich.
